gameDetails.name: One Night Ultimate Werewolf: Bonus Pack 1
gameDetails.description: One Night Ultimate Werewolf: Bonus Pack 1 consists of three new roles, three new artifacts, and three alternative artwork cards for use with One Night Ultimate Werewolf and One Night Ultimate Werewolf Daybreak. the three new roles consist of the Aura Seer, who learns who has woken up in the night and viewed or moved a card; the Cursed, who is a villager unless a werewolf votes for him (in which case he transforms into a werewolf and joins their team); and the Prince, who is a villager with the handy ability of not being able to be killed.
